document.full_text: china, wielding its huge dollar holdings, on friday pressed washington to tackle its huge fiscal deficit and said it would raise the issue of discrimination against chinese investors at high-level talks next week.
document.title: china pushes u.s. on debt ahead of high-level talks
lines_and_colors: china, wielding its huge dollar holdings, on friday pressed washington to tackle its huge fiscal deficit and said it would raise the issue of discrimination against chinese investors at high-level talks next week.
